description: Travel itinerary analyzer. Extracts the trip name, destinations, start and end dates, and recommendations.

TripName.description: The title or main heading describing the travel plan.

Destinations.description: Locations included in the travel itinerary.

StartDate.description: The start date of the trip.

EndDate.description: The end date of the trip.

ExistingPlans.description: Text containing attractions, dining, and transportation details.
